system.description: Effect: The target's Starting Ability is changed to Simple until combat ends, they switch out, or are @Affliction[fainted]. If the target has more than one Starting Ability, they choose which Ability is replaced. A creature can only be affected by one instance of the effect of Simple Beam at a time.
